TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CspParameters extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含一些参数，这些参数传递到指定加密计算的加密服务提供程序 (CSP)。

span.span: Contains parameters that are passed to the cryptographic service provider (CSP) that performs cryptographic computations.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示可以将它们传递给托管的加密类可在内部使用 Microsoft 加密服务提供商 (Csp) 从非托管的 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的参数。The class represents parameters that you can pass to managed cryptography classes that internally use Microsoft Cryptographic Service Providers (CSPs) from the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI). 名称结尾"CryptoServiceProvider"中的类是相应的 CSP 的托管的代码包装。Classes with names ending in "CryptoServiceProvider" are managed code wrappers for the corresponding CSP. 使用类来执行以下操作：Use the class to do the following: - 通过将传递到的提供程序类型中指定特定的 CSP或属性。Specify a particular CSP by passing the provider type to the or property. 你还可以指定 CSP 使用的构造函数重载。You can also specify a CSP using an overload of the constructor. - 创建可以在其中存储加密密钥的密钥容器。Create a key container where you can store cryptographic keys. 密钥容器提供的最安全的方法以持久保存加密密钥并将它们其恶意第三方保密。Key containers provide the most secure way to persist cryptographic keys and keep them secret from malicious third parties. 有关创建密钥容器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 存储非对称密钥存储在密钥容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about creating key containers, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). - 指定是要创建非对称签名密钥还是非对称交换密钥使用属性。Specify whether to create an asymmetric signature key or an asymmetric exchange key using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器使用类并将密钥保存在容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例使用类，以选择智能卡加密服务提供程序。The following code example uses the class to select a Smart Card Cryptographic Service Provider. 它然后签名和验证使用智能卡的数据。It then signs and verifies data using the smart card. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CPP/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/VB/example.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这种形式的初始化字段的值为`24`，它指定 PROV_RSA_AES 提供程序。This form of initializes the field to a value of `24`, which specifies the PROV_RSA_AES provider. 此默认的提供程序与兼容算法。This default provider is compatible with the algorithm. 有关其他提供程序类型的信息，请参阅字段。For information about other provider types, see the field. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器使用类并将密钥保存在容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 dwTypeIn) cil managed

param.name: dwTypeIn
param.span: 指定要创建的提供程序类型的提供程序类型代码。

span.span: A provider type code that specifies the kind of provider to create.

summary.span: 使用指定的提供程序类型代码初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified provider type code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数可通过将数字的值传递指定的提供程序类型表示该提供程序。Use the constructor to specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents that provider. 表示默认提供程序类型的数字值 WinCrypt.h 标头文件中定义：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与兼容的提供算法，传递的值`1`到`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定与兼容的提供算法，传递的值`13`到`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 有关其他提供程序类型值的信息，请参阅字段。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 有关默认提供程序类型和它们的行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 库中的 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器使用类并将密钥保存在容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来指定提供程序类型和名称。Use the constructor to specify a provider type and name. 通过将传递一个数字值，表示所需的提供程序类型中指定的提供程序类型。Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type. 表示默认提供程序类型的数字值 WinCrypt.h 标头文件中定义：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与兼容的提供算法，传递的值`1`到`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定与兼容的提供算法，传递的值`13`到`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 有关其他提供程序类型值的信息，请参阅字段。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 有关默认提供程序类型和它们的行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 库中的 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类，以选择智能卡加密服务提供程序。The following code example uses the class to select a Smart Card Cryptographic Service Provider. 它然后签名和验证使用智能卡的数据。It then signs and verifies data using the smart card. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CPP/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.SmartCardCSP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.SmartCardCSP/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数来指定提供程序类型、 提供程序名称，以及容器名称。Use the constructor to specify a provider type, a provider name, and a container name. 容器名称可用于检索该容器内的键。You can use the container name to retrieve a key within that container. 通过将传递一个数字值，表示所需的提供程序类型中指定的提供程序类型。Specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents the desired provider type. 表示默认提供程序类型的数字值 WinCrypt.h 标头文件中定义：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与兼容的提供算法，传递的值`1`到`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `1` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. - 若要指定与兼容的提供算法，传递的值`13`到`dwTypeIn`参数。To specify a provider compatible with the algorithm, pass a value of `13` to the `dwTypeIn` parameter. 有关其他提供程序类型值的信息，请参阅字段。For information about other provider type values, see the field. 有关默认提供程序类型和它们的行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 库中的 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.

summary.span: 获取或设置表示容器访问权限及审核规则的 对象。

value.span: 表示容器访问权限及审核规则的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents access rights and audit rules for a container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定对象，用于管理创建的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 和系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 容器。Use the property to specify a object that manages the creation of discretionary access control lists (DACLS) and system access control lists (SACLS) for a container.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::CspProviderFlags Flags { System::Security::Cryptography::CspProviderFlags get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::CspProviderFlags value); };

summary.span: 表示修改加密服务提供程序 (CSP) 的行为的 的标志。

span.span: Represents the flags for that modify the behavior of the cryptographic service provider (CSP).

value.span: 枚举值或枚举值的按位组合。

span.span: An enumeration value, or a bitwise combination of enumeration values.
Value is not a valid enumeration value.

summary.span: 表示 的密钥容器名称。

span.span: Represents the key container name for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来指定密钥容器的名称。Use the field to specify a name for your key container. 容器名称可用于检索该容器中保存的密钥。You can use the container name to retrieve the persisted key within that container. 有关创建密钥容器的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 存储非对称密钥存储在密钥容器](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md)。For more information about creating key containers, see [How to: Store Asymmetric Keys in a Key Container](~/docs/standard/security/how-to-store-asymmetric-keys-in-a-key-container.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个密钥容器使用类并将密钥保存在容器中。The following code example creates a key container using the class and saves the key in the container. [!code-cpp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CPP/capikey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/CS/capikey.cs#1)] [!code-vb[capikey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/capikey/VB/capikey.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指定非对称密钥被创建为签名密钥还是交换密钥。

span.span: Specifies whether an asymmetric key is created as a signature key or an exchange key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段初始化属性初始化时对象对象。The field initializes the property when you initialize a object with a object. 交换密钥是用于加密会话密钥，以便它们可以安全地存储以及与其他用户交换非对称密钥对。An exchange key is an asymmetric key pair used to encrypt session keys so that they can be safely stored and exchanged with other users. 你可以使用值 (`1`) 来指定交换密钥。You can use the value (`1`) to specify an exchange key. 此值对应于`AT_KEYEXCHANGE`使用非托管在 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_KEYEXCHANGE` value used in the unmanaged Microsoft Cryptographic API (CAPI). 签名密钥是用于验证数字签名的消息或文件的非对称密钥对。A signature key is an asymmetric key pair used for authenticating digitally signed messages or files. 你可以使用值 (`2`) 来指定签名密钥。You can use the value (`2`) to specify a signature key. 此值对应于`AT_SIGNATURE`CAPI 中使用的值。This value corresponds to the `AT_SIGNATURE` value used in CAPI. 默认情况下，字段指定交换密钥。By default, the field specifies an exchange key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举来指定的密钥类型对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration to specify a key type for an object. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.KeyNumber#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.KeyNumber/VB/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::SecureString ^ KeyPassword { System::Security::SecureString ^ get(); void set(System::Security::SecureString ^ value); };
member this.KeyPassword : System.Security.SecureString with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与智能卡密钥相关的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets a password associated with a smart card key.

value.span: 与智能卡密钥相关的密码。

span.span: A password associated with a smart card key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来提供智能卡密钥的密码。Use the property to supply a password for a smart card key. 指定使用此属性的密码时，密码对话框中将不向用户显示。When you specify a password using this property, a password dialog box will not be presented to the user.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property IntPtr ParentWindowHandle { IntPtr get(); void set(IntPtr value); };
member this.ParentWindowHandle : nativeint with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置智能卡密码对话框的非托管父级窗口的句柄。

span.span: Gets or sets a handle to the unmanaged parent window for a smart card password dialog box.

value.span: 智能卡密码对话框的父级窗口的句柄。

span.span: A handle to the parent window for a smart card password dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定智能卡的密码对话框的非托管的父窗口的句柄。Use the property to specify a handle to the unmanaged parent window for a smart card password dialog box. 指定使用此属性的句柄时，将向用户显示一个智能卡的密码对话框。When you specify a handle using this property, a smart card password dialog box will be presented to the user. 通过显式指定密码，通过提供智能卡的密码对话框，可以避免属性。You can avoid presenting a smart card password dialog box by explicitly specifying a password by using the property.

summary.span: 表示 的提供程序名称。

span.span: Represents the provider name for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供程序名称，请参阅 MSDN 库的详细信息中的 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 文档。See the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library for details on provider names.

summary.span: 表示 的提供程序类型代码。

span.span: Represents the provider type code for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来指定提供程序类型，通过将传递一个数字值，表示该提供程序。Use the field to specify a provider type by passing a numeric value that represents that provider. 表示默认提供程序类型的数字值 WinCrypt.h 标头文件中定义：The numeric values that represent the default provider types are defined in the WinCrypt.h header file: - 若要指定与兼容的提供类中，将值传递`1`。To specify a provider compatible with the class, pass a value of `1`. - 若要指定与兼容的提供类中，将值传递`13`。To specify a provider compatible with the class, pass a value of `13`. 下表列出提供程序类型和其对应的数字值在 WinCrypt.h 标头文件中定义。The following table lists the provider types and their corresponding numeric values defined in the WinCrypt.h header file. |提供程序类型Provider Type|数字值Numeric Value| |-------------------|-------------------| |`PROV_RSA_FULL`|11| |`PROV_RSA_SIG`|22| |`PROV_DSS`|33| |`PROV_FORTEZZA`|44| |`PROV_MS_EXCHANGE`|55| |`PROV_SSL`|66| |`PROV_RSA_SCHANNEL`|1212| |`PROV_DSS_DH`|1313| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_SIG`|1414| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_SIG`|1515| |`PROV_EC_ECDSA_FULL`|1616| |`PROV_EC_ECNRA_FULL`|1717| |`PROV_DH_SCHANNEL`|1818| |`PROV_SPYRUS_LYNKS`|2020| |`PROV_RNG`|2121| |`PROV_INTEL_SEC`|2222| |`PROV_REPLACE_OWF`|2323| |`PROV_RSA_AES`|2424| 有关默认提供程序类型和它们的行为的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 库中的 Microsoft 加密 API (CAPI) 文档。For more information about the default provider types and their behaviors, see the Microsoft Cryptography API (CAPI) documentation in the MSDN library.
